Summary: I thought it was a fire work at first.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was out side with my family shooting off fire works and i look out in to the field and above the tree line was a big red fire ball at first i thought it was a fire work but then it got brighter and sped up a little bit i watched it move across the tree's it was just above them then it got higher and started moving up and dimmed down just a little then one of my family members looked up at it with me and we watched it as it got brighter again and we stood up to get a better look and it just stopped and got brighter and then it got real dim and started to fade till it was gone it only took it about 5 seconds to disappear it was round and looked like a fire ball to me or a commit it started about 35 miles away and moved till it was only about 4 or 5 miles away it was a bright red almost an orange red that's about all i can remember.
